name: Netflix Ultra HD
update_details:
Must have Netflix subscription
This version will allow for 4K streaming if you have the Ultra HD subscription
Will stream in higher quality without Ultra HD subscription
- Must uninstall current version first, then run this update
- Instructions for SkyStream X2, X4 & X5 - Settings => Other => More Settings => Apps => Netflix => Uninstall
- For SkyStream ONE - Settings => Apps => Scroll right to Netflix => Uninstall
